title: Sound On: CDC Mask Guidance Update, Jan 6. Hearing
itunes:title: Sound On: CDC Mask Guidance Update, Jan 6. Hearing
description:
Guests: Bloomberg Health Editor, Drew Armstrong, Lawrence Gostin, Professor of Medicine at Georgetown University and Director of the World Health Organization Collaborating Center on National and Global Health Law, Republican South Carolina Congressman Ralph Norman, Ambassador Tim Roemer, former Indiana Congressman and 9/11 Commissioner, and Bloomberg Politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
